mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANIMAL_DETAILS ( ANIMAL_NO, SPECIES, ANIMAL_NAME, BREED, GENDER, AGE, WEIGHT, PET_SIZE, NEUTERED, VACCINATION_STATUS, HEALTH_NOTES, ADOPTION_STATUS, ADOPTION_CONDITIONS, HOPE_REGION, DEADLINE_DATE, PHOTO_URL, USER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_ANIMAL_DETAILS.NEXTVAL, #{species}, #{animalName}, #{breed}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{weight}, #{petSize}, #{neutered}, #{vaccinationStatus}, #{healthNotes}, #{adoptionStatus}, #{adoptionConditions}, #{hopeRegion}, #{deadlineDate}, #{photoUrl}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ANIMAL_DETAILS SET SPECIES = #{species}, ANIMAL_NAME = #{animalName}, BREED = #{breed}, GENDER = #{gender}, AGE = #{age}, WEIGHT = #{weight}, PET_SIZE = #{petSize}, NEUTERED = #{neutered}, VACCINATION_STATUS = #{vaccinationStatus}, HEALTH_NOTES = #{healthNotes}, ADOPTION_STATUS = #{adoptionStatus}, ADOPTION_CONDITIONS = #{adoptionConditions}, HOPE_REGION = #{hopeRegion}, DEADLINE_DATE = #{deadlineDate}, PHOTO_URL = #{photoUrl} WHERE ANIMAL_NO = #{animalNo}
mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_NO, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_UPDATE_DATE, P.VIEWS, P.ANIMAL_NO, A.PHOTO_URL, A.ANIMAL_NAME, A.ADOPTION_STATUS, A.AGE AS ANIMAL_AGE, A.GENDER AS ANIMAL_GENDER, A.WEIGHT AS ANIMAL_WEIGHT, A.HOPE_REGION FROM ADOPTION_POSTS P JOIN ANIMAL_DETAILS A ON P.ANIMAL_NO = A.ANIMAL_NO ORDER BY P.POST_REG_DATE DESC

#{item}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADOPTION_POSTS( POST_NO, ANIMAL_NO, USER_ID, POST_TITLE, POST_REG_DATE, POST_UPDATE_DATE, VIEWS ) VALUES( SEQ_ADOPTION_POSTS.NEXTVAL, #{animalNo}, #{userId}, #{postTitle}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{views} )
INSERT INTO ADOPTION_APPLICATIONS( ADOPTION_APP_ID, ANIMAL_NO, USER_ID, ADOPT_STATUS, APPLY_DT ) VALUES( SEQ_ADOPTION_APPS.NEXTVAL, #{animalNo}, #{userId}, #{adoptStatus}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, P.POST_NO FROM ANIMAL_DETAILS A LEFT JOIN ADOPTION_POSTS P ON A.ANIMAL_NO = P.ANIMAL_NO ORDER BY A.ANIMAL_NO DESC

SELECT P.POST_NO, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_UPDATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(P.POST_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS POST_REG_DATE, P.VIEWS, A.ANIMAL_NO, A.PHOTO_URL, A.ANIMAL_NAME, A.ADOPTION_STATUS FROM ANIMAL_DETAILS A LEFT JOIN ADOPTION_POSTS P ON A.ANIMAL_NO = P.ANIMAL_NO WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY A.ANIMAL_NO DESC

SELECT AP.ADOPTION_APP_ID, AP.ANIMAL_NO, AP.USER_ID, AP.ADOPT_STATUS, AP.APPLY_DT, TO_CHAR(AP.APPLY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APPLY_DATE_STR, A.PHOTO_URL FROM ADOPTION_APPLICATIONS AP LEFT JOIN ANIMAL_DETAILS A ON AP.ANIMAL_NO = A.ANIMAL_NO WHERE AP.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY AP.APPLY_DT DESC
SELECT ADOPTION_APP_ID, ANIMAL_NO, USER_ID, ADOPT_STATUS, APPLY_DT FROM ADOPTION_APPLICATIONS WHERE ADOPTION_APP_ID = #{adoptionAppId} ORDER BY ADOPTION_STATUS
